snippet: The victims were businesspeople who were traveling from Villahermosa in Tabasco State to Mexico City when the bus slammed into a broken-down truck.
abstract: Passenger bus slams into broken-down truck in Veracruz, Mexico, killing at least 36 people.
lead_paragraph: The victims were businesspeople who were traveling from Villahermosa in Tabasco State to Mexico City when the bus slammed into a broken-down truck.

headline.main: Bus Crashes and Burns in Mexico, Killing at Least 36
headline.print_headline: Bus Crashes and Burns in Mexico, Killing at Least 36
